header_text: Your friend has been coughing for a few days and when you ask them to go to the doctor, they refuse, saying they shouldn’t have to. You think this is strange. So you talk to them about it and find out that your friend doesn't want to go to the doctor because they are scared of spreading a virus.

elements.text: You convince your friend to go and are happy you were able to comfort and support...
